SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.lobby

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.lobby.Lobby
public class Lobby extends Object
the lobby is where players can be assigned to game which are not already started. It contains a reference to all the games that are instanced and the players which are waiting to join them

  • Method Details

    • addPlayerToGame

      public Game addPlayerToGame(String playerName) throws NoAvailableGameException, InvalidPlayerException, NicknameAlreadyUsedException, PlayersNumberOutOfRange
      the method add a player to one of the available games
      Parameters:
      playerName - the player to be added to the game
      Returns:
      the Game in which the player has joined
      Throws:
      NoAvailableGameException - if no game is available
      InvalidPlayerException - if the player is not in waiting list or the player nickname is already taken in the game
      NicknameAlreadyUsedException - if there is already a user in the lobby or in any game with the same username
      PlayersNumberOutOfRange - if the number of players is less than 2 or greater than 4

    • createGame

      public Game createGame(int nPlayers, String hostNickname) throws PlayersNumberOutOfRange, BrokenInternalGameConfigurations, InvalidPlayerException
      creates a new game
      Parameters:
      nPlayers - the number of player of the game
      hostNickname - the host player of the game
      Returns:
      the Game instance
      Throws:
      PlayersNumberOutOfRange - if the player's number is out of the specific range
      BrokenInternalGameConfigurations - if some internal configurations are broken
      InvalidPlayerException - if the host player cannot be found

    • createPlayer

      public void createPlayer(String nickname) throws NicknameAlreadyUsedException, InvalidPlayerException
      create a new player
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname to be assigned to the player
      Throws:
      NicknameAlreadyUsedException - if the nickname has been already chosen by another player
      InvalidPlayerException - if the username string is null, empty or longer than 15 characters

    • handleCrashedPlayer

      public void handleCrashedPlayer(String username) throws PlayerNotFoundException
      This method removes a crashed player from the waitingPlayers list if it's present
      Parameters:
      username - username of the crashed player
      Throws:
      PlayerNotFoundException - if the player is not present in the lobby

    • removeGame

      public void removeGame(GameModelInterface game)
      removes the game from the list of active games
      Parameters:
      game - the game to be removed
